channel.title: Adding chat logs

item.title: Adding chat logs
item.dc:creator: @Kalvin Kalvin
item.description:
@Kalvin wrote:

Hey i want to add chat logs and people keep sayin add this code to my client.java

This is the code people tell me to add

try { bww = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("chatlog", true)); bww.write( "time: " + hour24 + "." + min + "." + sec + " | " + playerName + ": " + misc.textUnpack(chatText, packetSize - 2)); bww.newLine(); bww.newLine(); bww.flush(); } catch (IOException ioe) { ioe.printStackTrace(); } finally { if (bww != null) { try { bww.close(); } catch (IOException ioe2) {} } } }
Note: Im using deltascape source

I add that and i get 13 errors.

Can you tell me where to place it in the client.java, if its the right code

If not tell me what the code is and tell me where to place itâ€¦

Thanks

Much appriciated

Kalvin

Read full topic
